short_summary: Electrical repairs and replacement work for 14 Wing Real Property Operations in Greenwood, Nova Scotia
description: The Department of National Defence, 14 Wing Real Property Operations, located in Greenwood, Nova Scotia requires the services of journeyperson electricians to provide all material, labour, equipment and supervision necessary to perform Electrical Repairs and Replacement work on an as and when requested basis.
full_summary:
**Public Notice: Request for Standing Offer**
=============================================

**Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer**
*   Request for Standing Offer under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Trade Agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement

**Contract Details:**
-------------------

### Tender Information

*   **Title:** Electrical Work - 14 Wing Greenwood
*   **Reference Number:** WS3759145778-Doc3767999892
*   **Publication Date:** March 17, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** April 13, 2023, at 2:00 p.m.
*   **Amendment Date:** March 17, 2023
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 18, 2023
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15733356?extsite=MTU3MzMzNTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15733356?extsite=MTU3MzMzNTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Description

*   The Department of National Defence, located in Greenwood, Nova Scotia, is soliciting the services of journeyman electricians for electrical repairs and replacement work.
*   Bidders must submit inquiries in writing, with receipt no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the closing date.

**Key Words:**
---------------

*   Electrical Work
*   Journeyperson Electricians
*   Building Maintenance Services
*   Handyman Services

**Disclaimer:**
--------------

*   This public notice is subject to revision. Any potential bidders are encouraged to review the notice frequently for updates.
*   We are not responsible for any errors or omissions in the public notice.
*   We will not be held liable for any claimed loss or injury resulting from the activities of any industry.
*   Please consult official documentation for all relevant information, no ambiguous language will be tolerated.
